tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE RoleBasedAccessControl (
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    role VARCHAR(50),
    device_id UUID,
    access_level VARCHAR(20)
)
CREATE TABLE roles ( role_id INT PRIMARY KEY, role_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, role_description VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL )
CREATE TABLE user_roles ( user_id INT, role_id INT, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(id), FOREIGN KEY (role_id) REFERENCES roles(role_id) )

CREATE TABLE device_permissions (
	permission_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
	device_id UUID,
	user_id UUID,
	can_read BOOLEAN,
	can_write BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE device_data (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    data_value VARCHAR(255),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES device(device_id)
);

CREATE TABLE access_control (
    control_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    role_id INT,
    device_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (role_id) REFERENCES roles(role_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES device(device_id)
);
